title: Meanwhile… Ketchup-Flavored Popsicles | Dijon Mustard Price Spikes
description:
Meanwhile… Chaos reigns in the land of condiments, as Canadians are eating popsicles made with ketchup and genuine French Dijon mustard is in short supply.
